summary: This script implements a full training pipeline for a text‑to‑image diffusion decoder, handling argument parsing, dataset loading and preprocessing, image transformations, model initialization, optimizer and scheduler setup, distributed training with Accelerate, periodic validation image generation, checkpoint saving, and optional upload to the Hugging Face Hub.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to fine‑tune or train a Kandinsky‑style text‑to‑image diffusion model on custom data, producing high‑quality generated images and facilitating model sharing and reproducibility.
